mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pr_batch_excel_map ( batch_code, excel_cols, mapping_result, identity_result, created_by, modified_by ) VALUES ( #{batchCode}, #{excelCols}, #{mappingResult}, #{identityResult}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedBy} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE pr_batch_excel_map SET
mapping_result = #{mappingResult},
identity_result = #{identityResult},
excel_cols = #{excelCols},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy},
modified_time = sysdate() WHERE batch_code = #{batchCode}
